value.name: Daly City wants AG to investigate fatal shooting of Black man with BB gun
value.description: Daly City wants the Attorney General to investigate the April 7 shooting when police fatally shot San Francisco resident Roger Cornelius Allen following a struggle over what turned out to be a replica gun.
